name: Nielsen's Radar
description:
This is a radar created from Nielsen's 10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design. You can use it to share knowledge about the usability of your product's interface with your team and your clients.


Important: Jakob Nielsen and the NNGroup did not participate in the creation of this file and it doesn't reflect any opinion or position of any of them. I simply used their shared knowledge to create this radar to help my team and other teams.
